title: 422: Help! Is My House Haunted? w/ Paranormal Investigator: Katrina Weidman
itunes:title: 422: Help! Is My House Haunted? w/ Paranormal Investigator: Katrina Weidman
description:
It’s getting spooky in here today, #broadsquad! Bekah and Jess are joined by the incredible paranormal investigator, Katrina Weidman (“Portals to Hell”, “Paranormal Lockdown”, “Paranormal State”)! They chat about how Katrina got her start as a paranormal investigator, what she believes, the most difficult aspects of her job, and some of her most frightening and chilling experiences. Also Jess talks about the recent paranormal activity in her home and Katrina shares her input and much more!

KATRINA WEIDMAN: 

***Follow Katrina on Instagram here: https://www.instagram.com/katrinaweidman/ 

***Follow Katrina on Youtube here: https://www.youtube.com/c/KatrinaWeidman 

***Check out “Portals to Hell” on Discovery+: https://www.discoveryplus.com/show/portals-to-hell 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:
